long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Epsilon Extension 🌟🕒

Epsilon Extension is your gateway to a beautifully customized new tab experience. Elevate your browsing with stunning backgrounds, versatile clock modes, a built-in Pomodoro timer, easy access to your search history, and the convenience of adding bookmarks, all in one sleek extension.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the: Epsilon Tab extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://epsilon-newtab.com/terms and Privacy Policy https://epsilon-newtab.com/privacy
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Key Features:

🖼️ Beautiful Backgrounds: Transform your new tab page with captivating backgrounds that change daily, creating a refreshing visual experience every time you open a new tab.

🕒 Customizable Clock Modes: Tailor your clock display to match your style and preferences. Choose from various clock modes, including analog, digital, and world clocks, to keep track of time in style.

🍅 Pomodoro Timer: Boost your productivity with the integrated Pomodoro timer. Stay focused, work efficiently, and take scheduled breaks to enhance your workflow.

🔍 Search History: Access your recent search history right from the new tab page. Effortlessly revisit your past searches and websites with a single click.

🔖 Add to Bookmarks: Quickly bookmark your favorite websites and online resources directly from the new tab. Organize your bookmarks and never lose track of your go-to sites.

Easy to Install and Use:

Installing Epsilon Extension is a breeze. Simply click "Add to Chrome" and instantly elevate your browsing experience. Our user-friendly interface allows you to seamlessly customize your new tab page to suit your needs.

Free and Ad-Free:

Epsilon Extension is completely free to use and free from intrusive advertisements. Enhance your browsing without any cost or distractions.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
